name: wvupebayfront
readme:
# wvupEbayFront This student project uses Node.js and builds upon ebay-api to provide one part of an aggregtor/wishlist app. It is frontend for the wvupEbayProvider (see repo).
##Status Creating/building (Draft finding complete, cart functionality next)
##Dependencies ebay-api
dotenv
body-parser
pug
express
##TODO DONE: Add needed dependencies (ebay-api, dotenv,body-parser, pug, express)

DONE: Build draft frontend form
DONE: Rescript script blocks
DONE: Solve propogation issue
DONE: Refine frontend formatting
DONE: Complete form logic
DONE: Integrate find functionality
DONE: Finish frontend
DONE: Refine output format
TODO: Integrate other APIs
ONGOING: Test!

https://github.com/benbuckman/nodejs-ebay-api
##References Main driver bason on in-class examples shown by A. Freeland on 10/12/2016 at WVUP.
Finding functions based on examples given by B. Buckman via ebay-api tutorials.
